basic.description:
A survey of major literary works written in Old English and Old Norse from the ninth to the thirteenth centuries. Readings will include sagas, epics, elegies, riddles, mythology, as well as historical and religious writing. Texts will be read in translation.
LEARNING HOURS    240 (72L;168P)
basic.subject: ENGL
basic.title: The Northern World: Vikings and Saxons
